name: Uno - The Virtual Card game
description:
It's for everyone and qzeq

and it's the virtual card game that you played

Welcome to UNO! Rules are in-game. And please obliterate that like button for more radical content! Toggle the amount of players in settings! Yeah! For the wild cards, type one of these in (Make sure it IS capitalized); R for Red Y for Yellow G for Green B for Blue ============================================= Yeah top loved 8-06! THX EVERYONE! Hey guys/girls/potatoes... Multiplayer may not be finished because this is a pretty buggy game AND I'm not the bes
